remarks: One-dimensional subspace (or zero-dimensional if ` X ` is the zero vector).  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lss1d.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lss1d.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lss1d.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lss1d.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lss1d.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lss1d $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } e. S ) $.
$d .x. k v $.
$d F k $.
$d K k v $.
$d V k v $.
$d W k v $.
$d X k v $.
